name: Mori (Jared Hahn)
description:
So this is a game I've released on iOS, but for Windows and Andorid because I should totally release it on those platforms too.

22-1-16, 11:30PM: Android build will be up here soon but I'm having compile issues and just wanna sleep before showing it off to people for two days. If you buy it now it'll be up here by the end of next week but you still get the PC version. <3

It's about infinitely winding a clock and nothing else.


Have a trailer:
